about.title: Innovative Full-Stack Developer and ERP Developer with over a year of hands-on experience, I specialize in building scalable applications that streamline business operations and enhance user experiences.
about.description: Passionate about turning complex problems into simple, effective digital solutions. Iâ€™m deeply driven by the blend of technology and design. Always exploring better ways to create impactful systems that empower users and make processes more efficient.

companies.company: Institute of Science and Bussines Atma Luhur

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer & QA Tester
description: Spearheading the development of a Student Funding Application Information System, aimed at digitizing and streamlining bureaucratic processes for 17+ student organizations and 5 university officials.
Built 10+ core modules using Next.js 15 (App Router) for the frontend and Laravel 12 for the backend.
Collaborating in a compact agile team using tools like Kanban boards, weekly code reviews, and centralized documentation on Figma & GitHub.
Created and maintained open-source projects.
Designed and authored 500+ functional test cases as part of the QA process, focusing on form validation, role-based access control, and business logic verification.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Conducted in-depth research and collaborated closely with the Tech Lead on ongoing projects, resulting in a 20% faster decision-making process and improved technical alignment across the team.
Facilitated bi-weekly knowledge sharing sessions (both technical and non-technical), positively impacting5+ team members and fostering a stronger collaborative environment.
Proposed 3 workflow improvements, with 2 successfully adopted, streamlining processes and improving team efficiency by an estimated 20%.

jobs.title: Enterprise Resource Planning Developer
description: Refactored legacy codebase, eliminating 1,000+ redundant lines and reducing code duplication by 35%, resulting in cleaner, more maintainable code.
Optimized critical logic by replacing nested loops with hash-based lookups, reducing time complexity from O(nÂ²) to O(n) and boosting execution speed by up to 90%.
Improved application UX by optimizing UI responsiveness, enhancing navigation flow, and ensuring a smoother user experience.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer ERP
description: Developed ERD and DFD based on workflows and UI/UX designs, completing the application 12.5% ahead of schedule while improving documentation and reducing errors.
Communicated with the Product Manager, improving application flow clarity by 45%, reducing misunderstanding, and ensuring efficient execution.
Tested the application and fixed 5+ bugs, improving system stability.
Refactored backend and frontend code, improving usability and readability by 30%.

jobs.title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Coordinated with backend developers to optimize application performance, reducing load times by 20%.
Built face recognition and PNPOLY method features, accounting for 33% of total deliverables.
Led regular 45+ minute team meetings to ensure focused progress.
Created feature documentation, decreasing errors by 30% and improving productivity by 20%.
Demonstrated more than 50% of project content to clients.

jobs.title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Collaborated and fostered team bonding among a diverse team of 11+ members from various divisions.
Conducted 15-minute standing meetings to report progress.
Prepared presentations on 7+ frontend web development topics for weekly meetings.
Developed a company website in 1 week.

items.title: SIPEDAK | Student Activity Fund Management System
items.description: SIPEDAK is a web-based information system designed to streamline and digitize the entire process from proposal submission to financial accountability for student activities at ISB Atma Luhur. The system improves efficiency, reduces bureaucratic bottlenecks, and enhances transparency and accountability by providing an integrated platform for budgeting, revision tracking, and report generation.

items.title: Contrihub | detikcom Contributors Management System
items.description: The contributor management application is designed to streamline the management of news contributors, from registration and news verification to honor management.

items.title: Employee Attendance System
items.description: A freelance project aimed at creating a secure and efficient employee attendance system by combining face recognition technology (face-api.js) with location-based validation (pnpoly method).

items.title: Sorting-Visualization
items.description: A project aimed at visualizing the functionality of various sorting algorithms.

items.title: Todo-Apps
items.description: A simple todo app made with Vue and Vuex.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me for questions, inquiries, or collaborations. Open to new opportunities and challenges.
